name: mongodb-admin
description: Web-based MongoDB admin interface written with Node.js, Express and Bootstrap3.
preInstallNotes:
In order for Mongo Express service to start successfully it requires atleast 0.3 CPU and 256MB of RAM. WARNING: Mongo Express on DCOS is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete
features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
If the `external_access` installation option is selected, this package creates an entry in the External Load Balancer for accessing the service from outside of the cluster on port `27018` by default.
postInstallNotes:
Mongo Express has been installed.
 Default Login `admin`
Default password: `password`
